cause.description:
Chuck Norris is and always will be the true frehur, so we propose a death sentence to all who speak ill of Chuck, anger Chuck, look at him funny, and don't appease his powerful will. Also, we also support death sentences by round house kicks, frat parties, keggers, martial arts, man beards, more round house kicks, and anything else that represents the will of the Chuck.
1. Chuck Norris is all mighty
2. round house kicks are cool and affective
3. Fuck Chip Beall
cause.mission: Keeping Chuck Norris as the most omnipotent God of them all, fuck Chip Beall!
cause.name: The holy Church of Chuck Norris for staying omnipotent
